Reviews.Title: “Great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Estanislao H
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. The only thing that is unbelievable is that they charge you for coffee at breakfast! Guys seriously? Come on! A boutique hotel cannot charge for coffee, if it includes breakfast it includes coffee.

Reviews.Title: “Good... but”
Reviews.Author: Elias A
Reviews.Content: Having read previews reviews about Galata La Bella, I had some ambitious expectations when I gave it a try. As many reviewers pointed out, the location itself is not vibrant, but it's only minutes away from major attractions. The metro station is easily reached from the hotel. Galata Tower is only a short, yet steep, walk away, and from there, you can reach one end of the lively Istiklal street. My room was extremely small it could barely fit my luggage. However the bed was large and comfortable, occupying almost all the space. The bathroom of my room was not large either, but it's not uncomfortably small. Bathroom and bed were clean. Safe box was not working for some reason. Breakfast was nothing special. I did not have a chance to visit the rooftop. The internet connection was actually very good. What I appreciated the most, is the hospitality of the receptionist. All in all, it was average, given the relatively not cheap rate I paid during that time.

Reviews.Title: “A hidden treasure!...”
Reviews.Author: aysegulbarber
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this beautifully decorated boutique hotel for 3 nights...I was very pleased with this exceptionally clean and very friendly hotel which is located in the back streets of Historical Galata region.... The breakfast was very generous with lots of options and the staff was very helpful and polite. My room was on the 6th floor with a breath taking view over the Golden Horn and Topkapi Palace. The bed was very comfy and the bathroom was very clean and modern. The location was the main reason I chose this hotel. It was only a 2 minute walk from the funicular railway which takes you from Tunel to Beyoglu. Also the hotel is within easy walking distance of the ferry and bus stops and a short walk to Galata Bridge and the historical sites on the other side of the Golden Horn. A special thanks for the front office manager Emrah for making my stay extra comfortable and special..I will definitely go and stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent staff great hotel great location”
Reviews.Author: Chloe A
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a great location near all attractions. But what really makes the difference is the efficient and very kind staff especially the front office team with emrah FO manager and the lovely girls. Thank you we had an amazing stay and Galata la Bella is our one and only choice when we come back to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Super staff”
Reviews.Author: bigal79800
Reviews.Content: This "boutique hotel" is superb. The location is perfect for visiting the tourist spots of Istanbul with easy access to public transport. The staff are probably the most helpful and friendly that I have come across anywhere. The reception area and rooms are very clean and well set up. The rooftop bar affords breathtaking views across the golden horn and Istanbul city. My only criticism is the non existent view from the lower rooms but then you don't go to Istanbul to look out of your room window and the roof terrace more than makes up for it! I shall certainly go back there.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: mvh49
Reviews.Content: Great hotel in a very centre position - on a clean, safe alley. Beautiful, exceptional clean, peaceful room with very comfortable bed, spacious bath room - everything better than one could expect. Lots to see easily by foot. Galata Bridge, Tunel to get to Istiklal Cad, and tram stop to Sultanahmet and Kabatas are round the corner - could not imagine a better location. And on the top of all - the personnel, every member of the staff was helpful. Really friendly reception, feeling at home when asking them anything. Service at breakfast was marvelous and trustworthy, in a really fluent, attentive, professional way. Summa summarum, really enjoyable stay in this hotel in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “New, modern and clean with a good location”
Reviews.Author: pierremesso
Reviews.Content: The Galata La Bella Hotel is not a big hotel. It's not located in a fancy area either but it do fulfill all your needs and more. The location is actually very good. 30 m from the subway that leads you to the famous istiklal street(2 min away) where you can shop till you drop. Or if you prefer other shopping destinations you have the tramway and other communications just 150 m away where the Galata bridge is located. From here you can also walk over the bride right to the old town with Grand Bazaar and other attractions such as Hagia Sofia, Blue Mosque etc. and it's not more that 7 mins away(to old town). The rooms are normal sized and very fresh. I've stayed at many 5 stars hotels that hasn't got nearly such fresh rooms to be honest. I stayed at room 202. The cleaning of the rooms was not the best because I noticed that only the bed was done but on the other hand I never left the room dirty either. The staff is gentle and some of them staff knows english. The restaurant is a bit small and during breakfast you it feels a bit crowded. They didn't offer what was on the menu the 2 times I asked. First time they said that the kitchen was closed just that day(?) and the second time they could only offer soup of the day and meatballs. There's also a roof bar with an amazing view over the bospor and old town. It was closed during my visit(winter) so I can't say anything about the service.

Reviews.Title: “ilda O "Super Hotel with effortless friendliness of it's staff....”
Reviews.Author: Ilda O
Reviews.Content: Stayed for weekend in this hotel and throughly enjoyed it. The property was fabulous with gorgeous Goldon Horn. Hotel in great location, city centre, ideal for shopping, sightseeing...The room was generous, spacious, impeccable. The bahtroom was a huge wet-room and very comfortable. The customer service is all areas of this hotel was top class... Value for money! Would love to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Super Hotel with excellent Service in a top location”
Reviews.Author: KundJ N
Reviews.Content: We had a great time staying at Galata La Bella Hotel: The rooms were spacious, modern and clean - just as on the pictures. The service was excellent. The staff was very, very friendly and helpful. They helped us with all our questions and were very polite. The location of the hotel is just perfect: just three minutes away from the famous Galata Bridge, in walking distance from the Galata Tower, the exciting area of Beyoglu, Taksim and Sultanahmet with all the sights. The highlight of the hotel is the terrace on the rooftop. The breakfast is excellent: hot and cold turkish specialties, fresh vegetables and sweets. Thank you very much Umut, Medeni, Ufuk and Emrah for the great service and all your help!!! We would come back any time!

Reviews.Title: “Superb hotel”
Reviews.Author: RDhesi
Reviews.Content: A fantastic hotel. Stayed at the Galata La Bella Hotel in January 2011, in a twin room. It is a new hotel itself (I believe it was opened at the end of 2010), and the cleanliness and finish is great. The service provided by the staff is superb, with the small attention to detail going a long way. Breakfast, which was included in the rate, was a fine mix of cereals, dried fruit, fresh fruit, eggs, freshly pressed orange juice, freshly brewed coffee, salads, cheeses and cured meats. I would thoroughly recommend this hotel, if you are able to get a good price as we did.

Reviews.Title: “unbeatable location and price/value”
Reviews.Author: 961Marco
Reviews.Content: One of the best price/value ever! Location is more than perfect: 1 min from Funicular to Istiklal; 3 minutes from tramway and ferry pier; 15 mins walk from Sultanhamet. Want more? Professional staff, tidy and cozy rooms, good breakfast. This is and will be our 1st choice in Istanbul. Any cons? Yes: forget a view at floor 1 2 3. You can see some rooftops at floor 4. Views on the city only at 5 and 6. Is that really a problem?

Reviews.Title: “Trip to Istanbul-Galata”
Reviews.Author: En T
Reviews.Content: Staying at La Bella was an extremely pleasant experience. The hotel is situated in a renovated 1930's-40's style building. Rooms were new, clean and up-to-date with today's amenities. The staff was very helpful and polite. Food quality was excellent. I highly recommend the rooftop for an after-dinner drink. Amazing views of the Golden Horn and Topkapi Palace. Few blocks away from the hotel is Istanbul's most famous live jazz/rock club "Nardis" and one block away from the club is the Galata Tower. Wherever you turn in Galata area there is something historic and entertaining to see. The hotel is walking distance from many trendy restaurants, cafes and shops.
